quote: A good prompt might be seven or eight sentences... the exact instructions you're giving it for a really good listing description.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the importance of detailed prompt crafting for effective AI use.
suggested_hook: Are your AI prompts falling flat? Here's how to craft them for success.

quote: Think about tools that would be helpful for your clients... you can pump this into any web page because it's just custom code.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to think creatively about using technology to serve clients.
suggested_hook: Want to stand out in real estate? Build your own client tools!
